skin.name: Unit Frames Skin
skin.hint: Select one of available skins for Unit Frames. Client-side setting only.

filter.name: Unit Frames Filter
filter.hint: Select one of available Filters for Unit Frames. Filters change the way Unit Frames look. Client-side setting.

showUnlikedTokens.name: Show Unlinked Tokens
showUnlikedTokens.hint: Check this to display the unlinked tokens in the Unit Frame.

showResourceValues.name: Show Resource Values
showResourceValues.hint: Check this to display resource values on Unit Frame bars for all players.

enableQuestTracker.name: Enable Quest Tracker
enableQuestTracker.hint: Check this to enable Quest Tracker HUD window. Requires Forien's Quest Log module installed.

questTrackerBackground.name: Quest Tracker Background
questTrackerBackground.hint: Check this to enable background for Quest Tracker, which might help with visibility on certain maps.

resetUnitFrames.name: Reset Unit Frames Position
resetUnitFrames.hint: Check this to reset position of Unit Frames to default. Use this if you moved Unit Frames into position where you cannot move it anymore.

resetQuestTracker.name: Reset Quest Tracker Position
resetQuestTracker.hint: Check this to reset position of Quest Tracker to default. Use this if you moved Quest Tracker into position where you cannot move it anymore.
